title: Celestia1
body:
<<Celestia>> 
Welcome to your Orientation Day as a new [b]Guardian of Dreams[/b]!
I’m sure you’re one of the luckiest souls to be in this program.
Alright, let’s test your abilities! To navigate, Press the [b]A[/b] AND [b]D[/b] KEYS to [b]Move Horizontally[/b].

<<Tala>> 
...
...

<<Celestia>> 
Splendid! Now try and press the [b]W[/b] KEY to [b]Jump[/b],
...
Great job! Now, let’s see your unique ability as a Guardian of Dreams
Press the [b]J[/b] KEY to unleash your [b]Glittery Punch[/b].
...
Magnificent! To make sure you guard this realm well,make use of your weapon. Press [b]K[/b] KEY to use your [b]Shiny Whip[/b].
...
Wonderful! Now I can see that you are ready to start your adventures. Take care of our dreams!
...

<<Tala>> 
Thank you so much for your guidance.
